mention.text: bogota , 4 jul 89 -- recently new phenomena have made their way onto the colombian political scene .
measures against ultra right-wing paramilitary organizations and differences are beginning to appear in the government and in the armed forces
the government who work as `` spies '' for the benefit of drug traffickers from the medellin and cali cartels
the secret police , general miguel maza marquez
the assassination attempt which had been prepared against him
